thread.title: Trump delays metal tariffs, EU still wants exemption

title: Trump delays metal tariffs, EU still wants exemption
text:
Trump delays metal tariffs, EU still wants exemption 1:49pm BST - 01:57
The European Commission says U.S. President Donald Trump's decision not to impose steel and aluminium tariffs on the E.U for now prolongs business uncertainty and repeats its call for a permanent exemption. But as David Pollard reports, markets welcomed the delay.
The European Commission says U.S. President Donald Trump's decision not to impose steel and aluminium tariffs on the E.U for now prolongs business uncertainty and repeats its call for a permanent exemption. But as David Pollard reports, markets welcomed the delay. //reut.rs/2Krishv
